internationalizations.description:
I consider myself a creative thinker and a problem solver who is passionate about solving real-world problems. I have a keen interest to be exposed to the bleeding edge of technology to innovate with the community as well as to build effective and reliable products fast. I have worked with many technologies that scale from the server-side to the client-side, from the circuit level to the OS to the application level. I am passionate about developing applications that make technological muggle people's lives easier. In my undergraduate life and industrial career, I have developed a pile of software solutions and performance-enhancing developments.

In my undergraduate career, I have developed full function many more monolithic application and microservice architecture based application so on. Also when I was working in a previous company I have done a lot of backends and front-end implementation and performance-enhancing development. And also I have worked with e-commerce application systems like Shopify and WordPress.

Nowadays, I keep seeking new skills, learning, sharing my humble knowledge as much as possible, and exploring new technological dimensions.
